docs.lead_paragraph: THIS little novel from the pen or Pearl S. Buck can scarcely be regarded as a successor to "The Good Earth," nor does it tempt comparison with that beautifully written and strangely moving chronicle of the Chinese peasant.

headline.main: " The Young Revolutionist" and Other Works of Fiction; THE YOUNG REVOLUTIONIST. By Pearl S. Buck. 182 pp. New York: Friendship Press. (Dis- tributed by the John Day Com- pany.) $1.50. Latest Works of Fiction Latest Works of Fiction Latest Works of Fiction
